entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: X509ChainTrustMode.CustomAnchorTrust #99426
  • [8.0] CryptographicException : An unknown chain building error occurred - Failing in test System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #99425
  • [8.0][wasm] Exit code 137 returned from docker process after executing containerHandlerInvoker.js, cs files specified multiple times #99423
  • [API Proposal]: JsonDerivedTypeAttribute<T> for simplified polymorphic JSON configuration #99421
  • Behaviour change in HTTPHeaders.Add between .NET 6.0 and 8.0? #99416
  • [jitstressregs] Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling fails #99414
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/more_tailcalls/more_tailcalls.cmd #99410
    9.0.0
  • ILC fails with System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #99409
  • Linux Platform All net version #99406
  • [MONO][Interp][Wasm] RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #99398
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 9 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99417
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 3/1/2024 10:59:41 PM #99419
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Invalid method header format 1 #99395
    9.0.0
  • Net8 - Vector2.Normalize and old(?) CPU - wrong result #99391

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Linq.Tests.Perf_Enumerable #97692
    9.0.0
  • [Windows.Networking.Connectivity.WwanDataClass] Enum is missing 5G #99420
  • Iterating Through Nullable Properties is Inconsistent. #99427
  • `TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById(String)` method returns a `TimeZoneInfo` object that is reference equal of the provided `TimeZoneInfo` #98571
    Future
  • iOS Connecting with Server with TLS 1.3 Only fails #97025
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 6 Regressions on 3/5/2024 12:14:12 AM #99418
  • [7.0] [wasm] Chrome DateTimeTests CheckDateTimeLocale failure #88799
    Future
  • Getting .net framework error when starting ADFS management console #99155
  • X509Certificate2 class cannot create cert for algorithm 1.3.101.112 #99388
  • Bookkeeping bug in HttpConnectionPool when handling an HTTP/2 => HTTP/1.1 downgrade #99401
    9.0.0
  • The project does not have a valid ProjectGuid. WorkerExtensions.csproj #99352
  • String.IsInterned always interns the string passed in to it #99386
  • Update some of NativeAOT's uses of Lock to use non-alertable waits #97105
    9.0.0
  • Implement StateDump callback for lttng on Linux #5846
    Future
  • [Memory consumption] Relative addresses instead of relocations in MethodDesc section on ARM32 #8001
    Future
  • [local gc] enable use of NumaNodeInfo for local gc and PAL #10235
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ParamCollectionAttribute #99285
    9.0.0
  • Nullable value type corrupted on Arm64 #99377
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters #99135
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt.Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding(Byte[] data) #99369
  • Make compiler warnings as errors for test projects to enforce explicit handling of warnings during tests build #10786
    Future
  • Improve test coverage for type loader error handling #11291
    Future
  • [Linux/x86] Unexpected unhandled exception occurs in release with ngened mscorlib #11374
    Future
  • Question: Should .Net remove dependency on the C runtime? #12895
    Future
  • Question: Porting to new constrained hardware #12896
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Dictionary<T, List<T>>.AddToList #99434
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    needs-area-label
  • Enable publishing in VMR #99432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix overaggressive switch optimization in regex source generator #99431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAOT] win-x86: Calling conventions #99430
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the right owning module in type string resolution #99429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use sentinel arg to clear error register pre-Swift call #99428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix negative lookaround stack handling #99424
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • Fix GCStress disabling of ParallelCrashTester #99412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0][browser] Fix failures in `CalendarTestBase` affecting several globalization tests #99407
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • testing GC handle #99403
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-mono
  • [browser][MT] Fix Promise cancelation #99397
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [workload-testing] Misc improvements #99392
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Enable 'compile-in-child' aot mode on ios. #99390
    area-Build-mono
  • [6.0] Fix usage of recycled lists in the thread pool #99387
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.29

Merged

  • Fix GC hole in Guid #99138
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-reliability
  • Update analyzer to use FeatureGuardAttribute #99340
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add helper method for updating bbTargetEdge #99362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for ByRefLike testing #99415
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Delete Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99373
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnitTests on Windows set to UTF8 encoding #99393
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Fix build on GCC #99399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove INS_SCALABLE_OPTS_SHIFT #99258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in crossgen2 #99394
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: profile checking through loop opts #99367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some comments on interfaces in `System.Numerics` #98398
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix HTTP2 => HTTP/1.1 downgrade bookkeeping #99402
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove MINT_CKNULL when doing a virtcall #99405
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fixed: potential AV in MethodTableBuilder::FindDeclMethodOnClassInHie… #99295
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm][bench] Use dotnet new wasmbrowser for browser-frame #99400
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98988
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98989
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [RISC-V] Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Fix bugs related to jiterpreter heuristic #99273
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Super instruction tweaks #99319
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][MT] Marshal resolved/unresolved tasks separately #99347
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix String.IsInterned regression #99389
    area-System.Runtime
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #99169
    area-Meta
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add ParamCollectionAttribute #99385
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add PerfViper queues and update PerfSurf queues #99068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Disallow parameters passed in float regs from being enregistered in int regs #99286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix InlineArray and some other corner cases in Swift lowering #99337
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Test on ci #99351
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Emit instances when using unmanaged generic calli in gsha… #99381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • Ensure `Array.Resize` creates an array of the same type as the incoming array #99021
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Make Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite obsolete #99382
    area-System.Threading
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CC,CD #99284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Reduce overheads of enumerating Grouping from Enumerable.GroupBy #99365
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99357
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the throughput of SocketsHttpHandler's HTTP/1.1 connection pool #99364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] GC stress and faster checked builds #2527
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge feb24 #2514
  • Swift bindings generator with simple parser and emitter #2525
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use consistent naming scheme for properties #39310
  • `dotnet user-secrets edit` #39307
  • `UseWindowsForms` causes token `Windows` to be clobbered in global scope. #39299
  • RID in .toolsetversion is wrong #39288

Closed

  • OSX/Linux SDK includes Windows containerize.exe apphost #39289

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update TestAsTool builds to use 1ES pools #39308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry pick extensions fix #39306
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove unnecessary RemoveMSDiaTypeLib target from GenerateLayout.targets #39304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39291
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Only include containerize.csproj and net472 tasks on Windows SDK layouts #39303
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.129 #39219
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS for Razor #39302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.421 #39220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Compress all assets by default #39213
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Set UseAppHost=false in containerize.csproj #39290
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #39036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0.2xx] make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39267
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Another -2146232797, courtesy of new() #72448
    17.10
  • Async iterators permit yield return inside of lock blocks #72443
    17.11
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild contains in code path to non existent folder in nuget package #72441
  • Exception during execution of AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH terminates test process #72437
  • shift enter does not work for c# comments #72436
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling optional generic partial methods (no modifier) #72431

Closed

  • Analyzer warning when using default value expression for structs that contain reference types which are not nullable #72415
  • Access to primary constructor parameter fails with CS1061 #72411

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused diagnostic methods #72445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move Linux to building Roslyn.sln #72438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow the new `lock` in `async` methods #72435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Allow testing official builds on any branch #72433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cap signing file size to avoid OOMs #72432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove code for arbitrary diagnostic taggers #72409
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only use absolute URIs for TextDocumentLocation #72442
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused error-list types #72440
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Squeeze down the size of the skeleton reference cache. #72403
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove flags controlling diagnostic mode. #62735
    Area-IDE, Next
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce thread contention on ProjectSystemProject._gate #72424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix log contention issue #72419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup OptProf profiling for LanguageServer.Protocol #72404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce closure allocations associated with AsyncLazy usage #72449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP (try2): Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Standardize our Powershell code #72423
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Use AsyncBatchingWorkQueue instead of TaskQueue #72425
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • WIP: Lazy work #72368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #54420
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54419
  • [WebView2] WebViewManager does not search for the correct staticwebassets.runtime.json file when using a BlazorWebView from another csproj #54417
  • Any plans for Managed Identity authentication for Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis? #54414
  • Dynamically updating AuthentionSchemes on AuthorizationPolicies #54412
  • Perf improvement: https #54408
  • Problem with using AuthorizeView in blazor with prerendering #54407

Closed

  • Perf regression: plaintext, updates #54392
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #54409
  • MVC view with _framework/blazor.web.js doesn't import *.lib.module.js #54397
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #54382
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #48208
  • Investigate metrics endpoint behavior when exception middleware runs #52648
  • Restarting browser windows doesn't resolve CERT_INVALID error #54026
  • Blazor .NET 8 with Authorize attribute, "No Authentication Scheme" when running in Azure App Services #52326
  • Has anyone worked with an Asp.net Core Web API project implementing API versioning in .Net 8.0 and successfully deployed it in IIS? #53965
  • OAuth token endpoint failure when token contain an empty error field #53457
  • Identity functions not working #54248
  • CascadingParameter in EditForm causes InputText to re-render on every keystroke which loses cursor position. #54208

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable publishing in VMR #54422
    area-infrastructure
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Remove CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink test from retry list #54406
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Add a github workflow to update NPM dependencies #54000
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24153.2 #54345
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.29

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Use Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions in Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #4114
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for the new ISOSDacInterface14 #4545

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI projects with an ampersand in the name can't be built or loaded #21090
  • ShellSearchHandler WindowManager$BadTokenException on Android #21088
  • `<Border>` on Windows when display with display set to scale 250% #21087
  • I need to create image and I need to put on top of it button and label any ideas? #21086
  • SearchBar crashes on iOS 17.4 #21085
  • Debug start doesn't run the app, getting some errors #21084
  • Enabling XamlC in Debug doesn't VisualDiangostics SourceInfo for Elements #21083
  • AOT + Trim - Could not resolve type with token 01000005 from typeref #21082
  • [Hot Reload] Hot reload currently fails if you have service scope validation enabled #21081
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [testing] Xharness fails to run locally #21080
  • [ci] Fix build failures report to Github #21078
  • [testing] TestTemplates RuniOS fails a lot on iOS #21077
    Backlog
  • The static `FontSize` values under `Windows` are illogical #21074
  • Impementation Error #21073
  • [Android] MediaPicker in Android 14 #21071
  • [Andriod] Symbol packages are not published #21070
  • [Android] IView (such as image) with inital Rotation has Incorrect offsets of PivotX and PivotY #21068

Closed

  • Maui Blazor fails to show messagebox in Release configuration on Android #9117
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid Windows platform: BlazorWebView component not shown when nested in VerticalStackLayout or StackLayout #8472
  • Unable to block popups in BlazorWebView #7930
  • [Blazor Hybrid] CSS Hot Reload changes get applied with a flicker on the UI #7905
  • Improve behavior for missing WebView2 Runtime on Blazor Hybrid Windows platforms #6575
  • BlazorWebView should support the "Fixed Distribution Mode" of the WebView2 runtime #2548
  • The preLaunchTask 'maui: Build' terminated with exit code 1 #21079
  • [ci] Enable APIScan #19396
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [net9.0] Fix Trimming issues on Windows #19430
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [ci] Fix net9 branch builds #20109
    .NET 9 Planning
  • No hot reaload #20334
  • Android Hardware Acceleration is Disabled in Maui? Cannot turn it on? Cause of Android performance issues? (Should be Enabled by default...) #21069
  • Mica material causes issues w/ UI tests #21021
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Android performance issues - unable to sustain 120 Hz updates for anything significant #20979

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leaks in `GestureRecognizers` #21089
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏

Merged

  • [net9.0] Fix templates #21047
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • [main] [net9.0] Fix templates #21055
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21072
  • [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21061
  • Bump editorconfig csharp_prefer_braces down to suggestion #21041
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update repo documentation to reference Policy Service instead of FabricBot #21063
  • [Windows] Ensure consistent background colors for UI test cases #21022
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing

Updated

  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Fix ILLink warnings in source generated code #21054
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WIP] Cleaning up CI iOS simulator issues #20817
    do-not-merge
  • Optimize performance of Flex.Item #20034
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasFillFactor only gets applied when database is altered, not when created #33269
  • First DbContext query call is noticeably slower than subsequent calls. #33268
  • Use testcontainer for SQL Server tests by default #33267
  • EFCore 8.0.2 model building comsumes GB of memory and stalls #33266
  • Include query tags in interceptor metadata #33265
    Backlog
  • DateTime String Interpolation Issue #33264

Closed

  • Reduce allocations by setting capacity on dictionaries #33093
  • Incorrect apply projection for complex properties #32911
    8.0.4
  • How to have only One Column for ForeignKey in one-to-one relation with two entity to one TPH entity #33257
  • Filtering by Contains with HierarchyId and AsSplitQuery is not working #32976
    8.0.4
  • Cosmos: Narrow gap between EF and SDK LINQ provider #25764
  • Palio #33262
  • Helio #33263
  • Triggers Error Entity Framework Core 8 #33146
  • Tracking changes in json column in EF Core 8 and postgres #33087

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Retry on 203 #33261
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32911 - Incorrect apply projection for complex properties #33212
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33254
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33249
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The Release Notes link is invalid on the .NET 9.0 SDK installation wizard. #17874

Updated

  • .NET 8.0 aarch64 not available on Fedora 39 nor Ubuntu 22.04 LTS #17922

PullRequests

Created

  • Set the CrossBuild property instead of the CROSSCOMPILE environment variable #18915
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18901

Merged

  • Update build.proj to make the build mode clearer #18913
  • Add SdkArchiveDiff task to verify the sdk archive has all the expected files #18748
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #18905
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #18900

Updated

  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18112

  • remove .net framework containizerization assets when building non-Windows SDKs #16764
